sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Director: Lewis Milestone
Stars: Norma Talmadge, Gilbert Roland, Lilyan Tashman

Immerse yourself in the seductive world of Prohibition-era nightlife with this rare treasure, directed by Academy Award-winning filmmaker Lewis Milestone. Adapted from the stage play Tin Pan Alley, this gripping pre-Code drama captures the tension between love, ambition, and survival in a city that never sleeps.

Silent screen legend Norma Talmadge stars as a chorus girl caught between passion and the harsh realities of making her way in New York. Her loyalty is tested by the struggles of her husband, played by Hollywood heartthrob Gilbert Roland, a struggling songwriter determined to succeed. Their lives are further complicated by John Wray, delivering a standout performance as a ruthless racketeer and nightclub owner whose tough exterior hides a surprising soft spot for Norma‚Äôs character.

A must for fans of pre-Code cinema, classic Hollywood drama, and the unforgettable talents of Norma Talmadge, Gilbert Roland, and John Wray.

metadata.Plot: Chorus girl Jill and composer Fred are happily married until he steps out on her with another woman. Tired of his ongoing alcoholism and heartbroken, Jill decides to leave him and live it up, though she must contend with the unwanted advances of a notorious gangster who will stop at nothing to make her his mistress. And when she considers taking Fred back, matters could get deadly fast.
